items.content_html: Mini Link Locker API is a lightweight backend service using Node.js and Express.js to save and retrieve notes or links with a unique access_key. It supports tagging, expiry filtering, and deletionâ€”no authentication or frontend required. Data is stored in memory for simplicity.

It supports tagging, expiry filtering, and deletionâ€”no authentication or frontend required. Data is stored in memory for simplicity.
